Hi,

I am in need of prioritizing test cases such as p0, p1, p2, and p3. Th=
en we would like to run p0 testcases whenever there's a new build and then =
only rest of the testcases if p0 passes fully. So, I was wondering if JUnit=
 has such a feature out of the box. If not, could somebody point me how I c=
an achieve this? Any help would be highly appreciated.
